document.full_text: the navy has authorized its chaplains to perform same-sex marriages on military bases once the ban on gays in the military is lifted, but some members of congress argue the authorization violates another federal law.
document.title: navy chaplains cleared to perform gay marriages
lines_and_colors: the navy has authorized its chaplains to perform same-sex marriages on military bases once the ban on gays in the military is lifted, but some members of congress argue the authorization violates another federal law.
